gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdjustmentsDepreciationAndAmortisationExpense` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `CashFlowStatementMethodType` is equal to `Direct`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA7_CashFlowStatementMethodType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA7_CashFlowStatementMethodType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA7_AdjustmentsDepreciationAndAmortisationExpense')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA7_AdjustmentsDepreciationAndAmortisationExpense return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdjustmentsImpairmentLossReversalImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitLoss` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `CashFlowStatementMethodType` is equal to `Direct`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA15_CashFlowStatementMethodType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA15_CashFlowStatementMethodType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA15_AdjustmentsImpairmentLossReversalImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitLoss')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA15_AdjustmentsImpairmentLossReversalImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitLoss return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdjustmentsReconcileOperatingResultOther` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `CashFlowStatementMethodType` is equal to `Direct`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA16_CashFlowStatementMethodType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA16_CashFlowStatementMethodType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA16_AdjustmentsReconcileOperatingResultOther')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA16_AdjustmentsReconcileOperatingResultOther return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdjustmentsReconcileOperatingResult` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit6_AdjustmentsReconcileOperatingResult')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit6_AdjustmentsReconcileOperatingResult return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit6_ChildrenOfAdjustmentsReconcileOperatingResultDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit6_ChildrenOfAdjustmentsReconcileOperatingResultDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit6_ChildrenOfAdjustmentsReconcileOperatingResultCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit6_ChildrenOfAdjustmentsReconcileOperatingResultCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CashAndCashEquivalents` SHOULD be equal to + `CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtFST101Variable1_CashAndCashEquivalents')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtFST101Variable1_CashAndCashEquivalents return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtFST101Variable1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementFoundations_PrtFST101Variable1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
